duties_responsibilities.duty: Moving OU structure and managing group policies in Active Directory.
Deploying packages using SCCM and PowerShell scripting.
Supporting a complete hardware refresh of 260 different ambulatory clinics across Greater Los Angeles.
Creating SOP documentation for system administration tasks.
Troubleshooting any go-live issues that arise during the refresh.
Remote work with potential on-site travel to Los Angeles on an as-needed basis.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor's degree in IT or related field (Certifications such as MCSE, CompTIA, etc., preferred)
